events.message: I received my order yesterday but want to return it because it is not what I expected. How can I get a refund?
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning return and refund.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to return your order and get a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please confirm the order number and the reason for the return? This will help us process your refund accurately.
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I want to return the product because it doesn't match the description on the website.

Thank you for the details. I have initiated your return request. You will receive an email with a prepaid shipping label to send the product back, and your refund will be processed within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the clear instructions and look forward to resolving this soon.
Your refund case is now processed. Please send the product back using the provided label, and we will confirm once your refund has been completed.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent the product back and if everything regarding your refund went smoothly.
Yes, I sent the package yesterday and received confirmation of my refund today. Thank you for your assistance!
We are glad your refund has been completed successfully. Closing the case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
